trans-unit.source: Defines a condition with an associated set of actions to perform.
trans-unit.target: 定义具有一组关联的要执行的操作的条件。

trans-unit.source: A Rule consists of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> and one or both <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A> collections.
trans-unit.target: 规则组成<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>和一个或两个<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A>或<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A>集合。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> class using the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>类使用的名称<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 名称<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> class using the name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Rule" name="Rule" href=""></xref>, the rule condition, and a list of THEN actions.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>类使用的名称<xref uid="langword_csharp_Rule" name="Rule" href=""> </xref>，规则条件和 THEN 操作的列表。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 名称<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> objects to evaluate whether the condition is true.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>对象一起用于评估是否条件为 true。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> class using the name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Rule" name="Rule" href=""></xref>, the rule condition, a list of THEN actions, and a list of ELSE actions.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>类使用的名称<xref uid="langword_csharp_Rule" name="Rule" href=""> </xref>，规则条件、 THEN 操作的列表和 ELSE 操作的列表。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 名称<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> objects to evaluate if the condition is true.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>对象来评估条件为 true。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> objects to evaluate whether the condition is false.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>对象一起用于评估是否条件为 false。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> should be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>应进行评估。

trans-unit.source: When set to `false`, this property is similar to commenting out the rule.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为`false`，此属性是类似于注释掉该规则。

trans-unit.source: The default is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Rule should be evaluated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应计算规则;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建当前的深层副本<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>与此实例完全相同。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref>为<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>评估。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref>为<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>评估。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a description of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的说明<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A description of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 说明<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> classes to perform in the ELSE case.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>类在 ELSE case 中执行。

trans-unit.source: ElseActions typically set a variable value on one of the properties of the activity, calls a method of the activity, or calls static methods on types in referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: ElseActions 通常对活动的属性之一设置变量值、 调用活动的方法或对引用的程序集中的类型调用静态方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> causes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> to stop executing and returns control to the calling method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>导致<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>停止执行并返回到调用方法的控件。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> modifies a property or calls a method.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>修改属性或调用的方法。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> explicitly indicates that a rule is updating a variable.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction>显式指示规则在更新变量。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction>

trans-unit.source: This causes the re-evaluation of any affected rules.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致重新计算所有受影响的规则。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> to perform in the ELSE case.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>若要在 ELSE case 中执行。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> and the object passed as the parameter have the same value.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否的此实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>和作为参数传递的对象具有相同的值。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare the current object to.
trans-unit.target: 要比较当前对象与对象的对象。

trans-unit.source: if the current object and obj are the same; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果当前对象和 obj 相同; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的名称<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 名称<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the order in which a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> should be run.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示的顺序<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>应运行。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> classes that have a higher priority value are run before lower priority <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>在较低的优先级之前运行具有较高优先级值类<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>类。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>

trans-unit.source: Rules that have the same priority are run in the alphabetic order of their name properties.
trans-unit.target: 具有相同的优先级的规则的名称属性的字母顺序运行。

trans-unit.source: The Priority value can be positive or negative.
trans-unit.target: 优先级值可以是正数或负数。

trans-unit.source: The default value for any <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值中的任何<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>为 0。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule>

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the order in which a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> should be run.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指示的顺序<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>应运行。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> can be reevaluated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>可以重新计算。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleReevaluationBehavior"></xref> indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> can be reevaluated.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleReevaluationBehavior"> </xref> ，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>可以重新计算。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> classes to perform in the THEN case.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>类在 THEN case 中执行。

trans-unit.source: ThenActions typically set a variable value on one of the properties of the activity, call a method of the activity, or call static methods on types in referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: ThenActions 通常对活动的属性之一设置变量值、 调用的活动，一个方法或对引用的程序集中的类型调用静态方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> causes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> to stop executing and returns control to the calling method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>导致<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>停止执行并返回到调用方法的控件。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> explicitly indicates that a rule is updating a variable.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction>显式指示规则在更新变量。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction>

trans-unit.source: This causes the re-evaluation of any affected rules.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致重新计算所有受影响的规则。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> classes to perform in the THEN case.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>类在 THEN case 中执行。
